title: Restoring the Altar and Worship
summary: The people rebuild the altar and reinstitute sacrifices according to the Law. They celebrate the Feast of Tabernacles and lay the foundation for the new temple. While many rejoice, some weep, remembering the former temple.

faq.question: What was the first thing rebuilt?
faq.answer: The altar, so sacrifices to the Lord could resume.

faq.question: Why did some people weep when the foundation was laid?
faq.answer: They remembered the glory of the former temple and felt the contrast.
